answers.answer: I have some techniques to help the sensation in the nose.Do the kapalbhati for 10 minutes daily, and anulom vilom for 15 minutes, twice a day. Continue this for life, to keep your body in balance. After 14 days let me know, how you are feeling.Build up your timing gradually.If you feel tired or dizzy, stop and resume after one minute.Kapalbhati pranayam -(Do it before eating) Push air forcefully out through the nose about once per second. Stomach will itself go in(contract in). The breathing in(through the nose) will happen automatically. Establish a rhythm and do for 20 to 30 minutes twice a day. Children under 15 years – do 5 to 10 minutes twice a day.Not for pregnant women. Seriously ill people do it gently.Anulom Vilom pranayam –Close your right nostril with thumb and deep breath-in through left nostrilthen – close left nostril with two fingers and breath-out through right nostrilthen -keeping the left nostril closed  deep breath-in through right nostrilthen - close your right nostril with thumb and breath-out through left nostril.This is one cycle of anulom vilom.Repeat this cycle for 15 to 30  minutes twice a day.Children under 15 years – do 5 to 10 minutes twice a day.You can do this before breakfast/lunch/dinner or before bedtime or in bed.Remember to take deep long breaths into the lungs.You can do this while sitting on floor or chair or lying in bed.November 4 ,2011

Hello and hope you are doing well.The symptom described by you could be due to neuropathy. It is a disorder of the nerves which causes numbness, tingling, unusual sensations and sometimes pain. Diabetes Mellitus can cause neuropathy. Other causes like vitamin deficiencies, alcohol consumption and certain medications can cause neuropathy. You may need to consult your primary care physician to detect the cause.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: Hi, I have been getting a weird sensation traveling down the bridge of my nose.. it feels like a hair is tickling it?? Would you have any idea of why this is happening.. its been coming and going very frequently throughout the day at different time for about 2 weeks now.. Please help as its getting me worried! Thank you.
title: tingling sensation down my nose..
